summary: Me writing terrible fanfiction at 3am?? Yes

And if you say run, I'll run with you
And if you say hide, we'll hide
Because my love for you
Would break my heart in two
If you...
body:
And if you say run, I’ll run with you

And if you say hide, we’ll hide

Because my love for you

Would break my heart in two

If you should fall

Into my arms

And tremble like a flower.

reblog.comment:

And tremble like a flower.

tags: i dont understand how to tag things
title: good omens headcanon
body:
im too lazy to write it properly but…

ineffable husbands get engagement rings…

Aziraphale gets this one

and Crowley gets this one

it was Crowley’s (very subtle) idea and Aziraphale pretends to think its too cheesy so Crowley offers to miracle them into something less cheesy to which Aziraphale gets very protective over his little snake ring. they are also enchanted to send messages to the other in emergencies. the snake curls up tighter if Crowley is in trouble and the feather begins to loosen as if it were about to fall off if Aziraphale in trouble because after the whole apocalypse thing they need a better way to communicate.
if anyone (whose not human or the antichrist) ask they make up really outlandish dumb reasons for wearing the ring.
- it’s my pet… I got a pet… I wasn’t very good at having a pet.
-it reminds me I can fly…
-I found it and thought it looked neat so now I never take it off
-Shakespeare knew I was immortal and had left it too me to receive in the future

- I won it at a quiz but it’s cursed so I can’t take it off.

-thor gave it to me… what do you mean he’s not real?!?!??

- I found it in some cream cheese

anyway thought id share :-)

Sometimes I just want to curl up into a ball and die.
Sixteen, she/her, very confused about my sexuality. Love cats, dogs, thinking about our inevitable doom and riding a bike. Also chocolate.
Sometimes I post art and fandom stuff.

summary: Between the Salt Water and the Sea Strand
title: Between the Salt Water and the Sea Strand
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/306bmXs

by AnnetheCatDetective

It is both a 20s and a merfolk AU. If you can stick with me through that, it is a story about disability, and about passion and love– not only romantic, not only for other people, but about those things that we find passion in, and where we find purpose, and how we support each other. It’s about being different and the same. It is about a merman who just wants to read books, and a man who doesn’t know what he wants. It is about deciding who your family is. It is about mercy, and about longing, and about BElonging, and about kindness. It is about connection.

It is about what it is to be human.

Words: 3825, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Aziraphale (Good Omens), Crowley (Good Omens)
  • Relationships: Aziraphale/Crowley (Good Omens)
  • Additional Tags: Little Mermaid Elements, Alternate Universe - 1920s, Merfolk AU, MerMay, Disability, Gender Non-Conforming Character


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/306bmXs

summary: ☀️ (aziraphale/crowley) having sex in a sauna/bathhouse is all fun and games until a certain cold-blooded Someone gets a little...
question: ☀️ (aziraphale/crowley) having sex in a sauna/bathhouse is all fun and games until a certain cold-blooded Someone gets a little too sleepy and can barely keep his eyes open...... he's doing his best...... you can wake him up aziraphale i believe in u......
answer:
It was warm in the bath house. Very warm.

It had been Aziraphale’s idea, and when he’d suggested it, Crowley’s skin had been alight with excitement, that Aziraphale would suggest something so public, so kinky. Sure, it was a bit of a cliché, and had been for the past few thousand years, but cliché was alright with Crowley, if it meant something… in public. 

Except…

It was warm in the bath house. Aziraphale had managed to get the key from a friend, because it was usually closed on Tuesdays, and the air was hot and thick with a pleasant humidity that lingered on Crowley’s skin as he settled on Aziraphale’s lap in the sauna, nuzzling against the angel’s neck. 

Aziraphale’s fingers were playing over Crowley’s lower back, sliding through the moisture on his skin, and his fingers felt nice, but the steam felt like it was permeating him, and Crowley let his eyelids, which felt heavy, close shut as he relaxed against Aziraphale’s chest.

“Dear?” Aziraphale asked. 

“Mmm,” Crowley hummed, lazily rocking his hips against Aziraphale’s belly even as he stifled a yawn against Aziraphale’s neck. He felt like melting. The heat was glorious, beautiful, and it was seeping under his skin, making him want to curl closer to the angel and–

“Crowley,” Aziraphale said sternly.

“Hm?”

“You’ve got scales.”

“Oh.”

“Are you asleep?”

“Mmm… No…”

“Oh, for–” Aziraphale stood, hooking his hands under Crowley’s thighs, and Crowley groaned as the dislodgement, shoving his nose more sharply against Aziraphale’s neck as Aziraphale carried him out of the sauna room. For a moment or two, Crowley complained for the sudden cold, wriggling and hissing in his place, but then Aziraphale stepped down into the jacuzzi, and Crowley let out a sigh of satisfaction at the warm water against his skin, the pleasant bubble of the jets. “I didn’t bring you here so you could sleep, you devious little serpent.”

“It’s niccce,” Crowley hissed, his tongue flicking against Aziraphale’s neck, and he heard Aziraphale chuckle, patting his arse affectionately under the water. 

“Beastly,” Aziraphale murmured against his ear, but then he kissed Crowley’s temple, and Crowley curled more tightly against him.

blog.description: I tend to obsess over things, so for now: Good Omens and basically nothing else *_*

tags: i'm afraid i'll lose my mind before may 31
summary: With May 31 so close, I find it increasingly hard to think of anything but Good Omens, so today I keep thinking about the “I’m...
body:
With May 31 so close, I find it increasingly hard to think of anything but Good Omens, so today I keep thinking about the “I’m having a moment here” bit from the trailer. When I first heard this, I just smiled because Crowley sounds like a total drama queen, but today I put this bit into perspective and omfg, the guy has basically:

  • Openly rebelled against his ruthless superiors by killing a Duke of Hell and trapping another one
  • Lost the love of his life in a terrible fire that also devoured the place where they were happy together
  • Lost his beloved car he’s owned for almost a century
  • Lost almost any hope to prevent the end of the world he is so fond of 

All in one day, leaving him desperate, scared and alone in this horrible mess.

I mean, who wouldn’t be having a freaking moment after all this?! 

But…

At this very moment Madame Tracy is standing behind his back. And what if the next thing Crowley hears after “having a moment” is this unknown red-haired lady telling him “oh, hello, my dear” or something. In Aziraphale’s voice. And he will realize that he’s not alone anymore and that his angel is back by his side.

If the actual bit from the series ends up anything like this, I don’t know how I’m going to handle the emotional impact. I honestly don’t know!
